review: Recently Dr. Madam went cataract operation.  I wanted  to  know how  she  is feeling  now and she narrated in such a manner that I am her younger brother. Moreover, whenever I  met her for my dental problems  she  had  treated and advised in a very friendly manner  without  any vanity.
